desc: “Expect a Taste Explosion” – The Telegraph As seen on Channel 4, BBC News and more, World of Zing is home to the UK's most exciting range of Pre-Batch Cocktails and Bottled Cocktails. From our famous Aged Negroni to the delicious Rhubarb Cosmo, prepare to experience flavour beyond ordinary!
